item.title: Charfile prob
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

i am trying to add weight system (i will make a tutorial after it 100%), when i logout and then login its setting my weight to 0; and i want it to be the same as it was before i logout, example:
i wear party hat its adding 2 weight , then i logout (my party hat still worn) and then weight 0;
so idk how to fix it but i thought maybe add it to the character files but it didnt work:
i search character-energy and every time one line under i added my weight ints. look:
Note: the weight.something is from the weight class i made.
First time:

} else if (token.equals("character-weight")) {
weight.playerWeight = Integer.parseInt(token2);
}

Second time:

characterfile.write("character-weight = ", 0, 19);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(weight.playerWeight), 0, Integer.toString(weight.playerWeight).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Third time:

characterfile.write("character-weight = ", 0, 19);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(weight.playerWeight), 0, Integer.toString(weight.playerWeight).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Fourth time:

} else if (token.equals("character-weight")) {
weight.playerWeight = Integer.parseInt(token2);
}

Maybe i dont even need to add this to the char file?
my weight int:
public int playerWeight;

Read full topic
